actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize the construction of a monument in the District of Columbia to honor Thomas Paine, and for purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Thomas Paine National Historical Association to construct on Federal land in the District of Columbia an appropriate monument honoring the American patriot, Thomas Paine.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the construction of a monument in the District of Columbia to honor Thomas Paine, and for purposes.
